section.section: Every cooperative shall hold an annual meeting of its members to elect directors and to transact any other business within its powers.

The meeting shall be held:
At the time provided in the bylaws; or
If the bylaws specify a period not exceeding 31 days during which the meeting may be held, at a time within that period set by the board of directors.

text.section: The bylaws may provide for additional regular meetings.

section.section: The board of directors may call a special meeting at any time.

Ten percent of the members may demand a special meeting at any time by filing a petition which states the specific business to be brought before the meeting, and the board of directors then shall call the meeting.

text.section: Notice of each meeting shall be mailed to each member at least ten days before the meeting and, if a special meeting is called, the notice shall state the purpose of the meeting.
